devdoc.details: A transformer that transfers tokens to the taker.

die(address).details: Destruct this contract. Only callable by the deployer and will not      succeed in the context of a delegatecall (from another contract).

params.ethRecipient: The recipient of ETH held in this contract.

params.data_: ABI-encoded `TransformData`, indicating which tokens to transfer.
